decisions.what: Delay FTC cancellation funnel changes, implement only conversion funnel checkbox on Monday
decisions.context: Legal approval obtained to delay TPT checkout changes until August 18th due to conflicting initiative; GoodChop aligned to follow same timeline

decisions.what: Focus next 2 sprints on Wallet add-on persistence and P0 monitoring/alerting, with remaining engineers improving stability
decisions.context: To solve TR issues and improve observability before hearing issues from stakeholders; 2-week cadence experiment can be handled by 2 engineers

decisions.what: Prioritize PATCH /subscriptions deprecation for CDPS migration in next sprint (mid-August deadline)
decisions.context: Consumer Core rolling out CDPS and deprecating old endpoint; originally requested end of July but negotiated to mid-August
Would be too disruptive for team at this point in time

blockers.description: Multiple high-priority API deprecations competing for sprint capacity (PATCH /subscriptions and /calculate/batch)
blockers.impact: TPT squad capacity stretched across multiple urgent migrations with mid-August deadlines

blockers.description: Wallet add-on persistence causing TR (transaction) issues
blockers.impact: Affecting reliability; being prioritized in current and next sprint

blockers.description: Overlapping Tuesday afternoon meetings causing confusion
blockers.impact: Meeting conflicts clarified; leads meeting to be evaluated for priority and scope alignment

action_items.task: Update Weekly Team Update Notes before Monday standup
Implement FTC conversion funnel checkbox on checkout
Implement FTC checkout changes for TPT
Set up Anomaly Detection for TPT with U068H5475SP
Verify if DPLAT-2364 cadence bug affects GoodChop and TPT

key_context.summary: Legal compliance changes for checkout and cancellation funnels being rolled out across brands with staggered timelines. TPT delaying to August 18th while HF already launched July 7th.
key_context.relevance: Critical regulatory compliance work affecting customer-facing flows across all new venture brands

key_context.summary: Consumer Core deprecating legacy subscription APIs requiring migration work across GoC and TPT with mid-August deadline. Multiple competing deprecations creating capacity constraints.
key_context.relevance: Platform-wide technical debt requiring immediate attention to avoid breaking changes

key_context.summary: Teams shifting focus to P0 monitoring, alerting, and bug fixes after experiencing reliability issues. GoodChop has implemented anomaly detection dashboard; TPT exploring adoption.
key_context.relevance: Proactive approach to catch issues before stakeholders report them, improving operational maturity

key_context.summary: Teams balancing feature work with technical debt, migrations, and stability improvements. Experimenting with 2-week cadence and dedicated stability sprints.
key_context.relevance: Reflects maturation of new ventures from pure feature development to sustainable operations

summary: New Ventures teams coordinating FTC compliance rollouts, CDPS API migrations, and stability improvements while managing competing priorities and sprint capacity across GoodChop and The Pets Table brands.
